languages.text: "Вставьте инфоключ в когитатор у входа, и заставу накроет губительный для {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинных духов{/g} импульс. Начинку мин он выжжет, сделав их железяками с начинкой из фузелина".

"Insert the data-key into the cogitator by the entrance, and the post will be hit with a devastating pulse that is lethal to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. It will burn out the detonators and turn mines into harmless chunks of fyceline-stuffed iron."
languages.original_text: "Вставьте инфоключ в когитатор у входа, и заставу накроет губительный для {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}машинных духов{/g} импульс. Начинку мин он выжжет, сделав их железяками с начинкой из фузелина".

traits.locale_text: "Insert the data-key into the cogitator by the entrance, and the post will be hit with a devastating pulse that is deadly to machine spirits. It will burn out the detonators and turn mines into harmless chunks of fyceline-stuffed iron."

"Insert the data-key into the cogitator by the entrance, and the post will be hit with a devastating pulse that is lethal to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. It will burn out the detonators and turn mines into harmless chunks of fyceline-stuffed iron."

"Insert the data-key into the cogitator by the entrance, and the post will be hit with a devastating pulse that is lethal to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. It will burn out the detonators and turn mines into harmless chunks of fyceline-stuffed iron."

languages.text: «Introduzca la llave de datos en el cogitador de la entrada y el puesto sufrirá un pulso devastador que acabará con los {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}espíritus máquina{/g}. Quemará los detonadores y convertirá las minas en pedazos de hierro inútil con fycelina».
languages.original_text: "Insert the data-key into the cogitator by the entrance, and the post will be hit with a devastating pulse that is lethal to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. It will burn out the detonators and turn mines into harmless chunks of fyceline-stuffed iron."

traits.locale_text: «Introduzca la llave de datos en el cogitador de la entrada y el puesto sufrirá un pulso devastador que acabará con los espíritus máquina. Quemará los detonadores y convertirá las minas en pedazos de hierro inútil con fycelina».

languages.text: 「データキーを入口の考算機に差し込めば、{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}機械精霊{/g}には命をも脅かす破壊波動が流れます。起爆装置を焼き尽くし、地雷をファイセリン燃料を詰めた無害な鉄の塊に変えるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "Insert the data-key into the cogitator by the entrance, and the post will be hit with a devastating pulse that is lethal to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. It will burn out the detonators and turn mines into harmless chunks of fyceline-stuffed iron."

traits.locale_text: 「データキーを入口の考算機に差し込めば、機械精霊には命をも脅かす破壊波動が流れます。起爆装置を焼き尽くし、地雷をファイセリン燃料を詰めた無害な鉄の塊に変えるでしょう」

languages.text: “把数据钥匙插入沉思者，它就会发出毁灭性的脉冲攻击哨站，摧毁哨站内部所有{g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}机魂{/g}。这样一来，地雷的触发器就会失效，变成没有任何威胁的废铁。”
languages.original_text: "Insert the data-key into the cogitator by the entrance, and the post will be hit with a devastating pulse that is lethal to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. It will burn out the detonators and turn mines into harmless chunks of fyceline-stuffed iron."

traits.locale_text: “把数据钥匙插入沉思者，它就会发出毁灭性的脉冲攻击哨站，摧毁哨站内部所有机魂。这样一来，地雷的触发器就会失效，变成没有任何威胁的废铁。”

languages.text: "Legt den Datenschlüssel in den Cogitator am Eingang ein, dann wird der Posten von einem verheerenden Puls getroffen, der für {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}Maschinengeister{/g} tödlich ist. Er verbrennt die Zünder und verwandelt Minen in harmlose Eisenklötze, die mit Fycelin gefüllt sind."
languages.original_text: "Insert the data-key into the cogitator by the entrance, and the post will be hit with a devastating pulse that is lethal to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. It will burn out the detonators and turn mines into harmless chunks of fyceline-stuffed iron."

traits.locale_text: "Legt den Datenschlüssel in den Cogitator am Eingang ein, dann wird der Posten von einem verheerenden Puls getroffen, der für Maschinengeister tödlich ist. Er verbrennt die Zünder und verwandelt Minen in harmlose Eisenklötze, die mit Fycelin gefüllt sind."

"Legt den Datenschlüssel in den Cogitator am Eingang ein, dann wird der Posten von einem verheerenden Puls getroffen, der für Maschinengeister tödlich ist. Er verbrennt die Zünder und verwandelt Minen in harmlose Eisenklötze, die mit Fycelin gefüllt sind."

languages.text: « Insérez la clé de données dans le cogitateur près de l'entrée, et le poste sera frappé par une impulsion dévastatrice fatale pour les {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}esprits de la machine{/g}. Elle devrait brûler les détonateurs et transformer les mines en morceaux de fer inoffensifs, bien que farcis de fyceline. »
languages.original_text: "Insert the data-key into the cogitator by the entrance, and the post will be hit with a devastating pulse that is lethal to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. It will burn out the detonators and turn mines into harmless chunks of fyceline-stuffed iron."

traits.locale_text: « Insérez la clé de données dans le cogitateur près de l'entrée, et le poste sera frappé par une impulsion dévastatrice fatale pour les esprits de la machine. Elle devrait brûler les détonateurs et transformer les mines en morceaux de fer inoffensifs, bien que farcis de fyceline. »

« Insérez la clé de données dans le cogitateur près de l'entrée, et le poste sera frappé par une impulsion dévastatrice fatale pour les esprits de la machine. Elle devrait brûler les détonateurs et transformer les mines en morceaux de fer inoffensifs, bien que farcis de fyceline. »

languages.text: "Veri anahtarını girişteki kavramsayara taktığınızda mahalde {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}makine ruhları{/g} için ölümcül olan, feci bir atım gerçekleşecek. Bu da fünyeleri yakıp mayınları fiselin dolu demirden ibaret parçalara çevirecek."
languages.original_text: "Insert the data-key into the cogitator by the entrance, and the post will be hit with a devastating pulse that is lethal to {g|Encyclopedia:MachineSpirit}machine spirits{/g}. It will burn out the detonators and turn mines into harmless chunks of fyceline-stuffed iron."
